statements: UPDATE payments SET amount = 1500.50, payment_date = '2022-10-15 09:30:00', status = 'Paid' WHERE payment_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE payments SET status = 'Pending', amount = 2500.00, payment_date = '2022-11-20 15:45:00' WHERE payment_id = '456e7890-e12c-34f5-b678-901g23456789';
UPDATE payments SET amount = 500.25, status = 'Approved' WHERE payment_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE payments SET status = 'Declined', amount = 750.70 WHERE payment_id = 'a9fe56fe-90d7-4b73-9523-78ff9d2b60c1';
UPDATE payment_transactions SET amount = 100.50, status = 'Complete' WHERE transaction_id = 12345;
UPDATE payment_logs SET log_message = 'Payment processed successfully', timestamp = NOW() WHERE log_id = 54321;
UPDATE payment_transactions SET amount = 100.50, status = 'processed' WHERE transaction_id = 1234;
UPDATE payment_logs SET timestamp = '2022-07-15 10:30:00', log_message = 'Payment processed successfully' WHERE log_id = 5678;
UPDATE payment_gateways SET gateway_url='https://updated_gateway_url.com' WHERE gateway_id=1;
UPDATE transactions SET status='completed', amount=150.50 WHERE transaction_id=101;
UPDATE payment_gateways SET gateway_name = 'Stripe', api_key = 'stripe123' WHERE gateway_id = 1;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 1000.50, status = 'completed' WHERE transaction_id = 123;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 150.75 WHERE transaction_id = 100
UPDATE payment_methods SET payment_type = 'Credit Card', card_number = '**** **** **** 1234' WHERE payment_id = 200
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 10000.00, transaction_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE transaction_id = 1234;
UPDATE customers SET phone_number = '123-456-7890' WHERE customer_id = 5678;
UPDATE PaymentTransactions SET amount = 150.75 WHERE transaction_id = 1001;
UPDATE PaymentTransactions SET payment_method = 'Credit Card', user_id = 101 WHERE transaction_id = 1002;
UPDATE PaymentTransactions SET amount = amount + 100.50, timestamp = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE transaction_id = 12345;
UPDATE Users SET phone_number = '+1-123-456-7890', email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE user_id = 98765;
